==== for-of17.ts (2 errors) ====
    class NumberIterator {
        next() {
            return {
                value: 0,
                done: false
            };
        }
        [Symbol.iterator]() {
         ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
            return this;
        }
    }
    
    var v: string;
    for (v of new NumberIterator) { } // Should succeed
              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type 'NumberIterator' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
